name: WP-Recall – Registration, Profile, Commerce & More
author: Plechev Andrey

sections.description:
The plugin forms a flexible and functional personal account, allows users of your website to easily communicate, customize their profile, launch interest groups, interact on the forum, pay for orders in your online store and much more.

Check out all beauty and power of the plugin by watching this video:

website | addons | documentation | support

The base part of the plugin already includes a wide range of features, which you can use right after activation:

  • Profile Recall – User profile (customizable users profile, easy create and drag & drop to reorder user profile fields)
  • Rcl Chat – Personal messages and global chats (easy & no limits chats on shortcodes)
  • Rating system – stars, like/dislike or simple like. Ratings for commens, posts, and other type
  • Public Recall – Front-end publisher with multi-photo uploader (The user can create a new post and edit it from the frontend).
  • User balance – Personal user balance
  • Commerce – Store (free eCommerce add-on)
  • Groups Recall – free solution for group-oriented memberships and content access control (closed groups)
  • PrimeForum – lightweight wordpress forum add-on (Seo URLs)

Features of the plugin include:

  • Front-end user profiles
  • Front-end user registration
  • Front-end user login
  • Frontend publications (frontend posting)
  • Custom form fields
  • Drag and drop form builder (profile & publications)
  • User account page
  • User list
  • User avatar uploader (Custom avatars)
  • User cover uploader
  • Private Messages
  • Rating system
  • eCommerce
  • Groups
  • Elegant user profiles (included 2 user cabinet themes)
  • Forum
  • Drag and Drop forum management system.
  • Topic and Post front-end moderation.
  • Many shortcodes
  • Developer friendly with dozens of actions and filters
  • Translation Ready

Forum migration tools

Free Integrate with third-party plugins:

  • Woocommerce
  • WP-PostRatings
  • All in One SEO Pack
  • WP-PostViews
  • Download Monitor

Paid Extensions

WP-Recall has a range of extensions that allow you to extend the power of the plugin

  • ADV System – advertising system for the site
  • Achievement system – achievement system with awards for user actions
  • User Info Tab – advanced profile tab
  • Across Ocean Pro – advanced personal account template
  • Birthday in Profile – the output of the user’s birthday
  • WP Access Ultimate – paid temporary access
  • Shop Service – organization of orders for executors services
  • Invest System – investment system for the site
  • Partners System – multi-level affiliate system

You can easily expand the personal account features through the existing numerous add-ons

The plugin allows you to change the template of your personal account, choosing from two supplied ones or by installing a new template

If you want, you can easily add a tab with the necessary content to your personal account by creating it in the administrator part or by writing your add-on by following a simple instruction

Development and Translations

If you’re a developer and would like to contribute to the source code of the plugin you can do so via our GitHub Repository.

Want to add a new language to WP-Recall? Great! You can contribute via translate.wordpress.org.
sections.installation:
1. Upload dir wp-recall to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

When you first activate the plugin, it will create everything necessary for its operation and will activate the basic page add-on.
